CMS_EmailTemplate.EmailTemplateText:
Hello,

Thank you for your registration for event {%EventName|(encode)false%}. This is an e-mail confirmation that you have been registered. Below, you can find event details:

Event: {%EventName|(encode)false%}

{%EventSummary|(encode)false%}

{%EventDetails|(encode)false%}

Location:
{%EventLocation|(encode)false%}

Date:
{%EventDateString|(encode)false%}

Dear {% UserFullName %},welcome to {% CurrentSite.SiteDomainName |(user)administrator|(hash)2413a7f30e7983060fbff5de39c6c07f73ac7213c3394038922bb89346453e60%}! Meanwhile, we have prepared an account for you. With your new account you can easily review your orders and manage your personal information. {% if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(AccountUrl)){ %} Just login with your e-mail address and new password at {%AccountUrl%}. {% } |(encode)false |(user)administrator|(hash)d5d13c25425ff80acddfa416c62cdefa92fa2ef06f1970cf16d066c396bac609%}

Login details:

E-mail(username): {% TrimSitePrefix(UserName) %}
Password: {% Password %}

You have bought the following e-products, please download them until their download links expire. Once the download link expires, you won't be able to download the file.
{%EproductsTable.ApplyTransformation("Ecommerce.Transformations.Order_EproductsTable")|(user)administrator|(hash)f6828c8c1be49855bcda882018268dd701ea6d500c87721bfa7ec9b9cf2b08c1%}
You can download your e-products also from My profile -> Orders section until their expiration.
This is an automatic reminder, please do not respond.
Thank you.

New order Company logo
Invoice number {%HTMLEncode(Order.OrderInvoiceNumber) |(user)administrator|(hash)77f4e221ae7e479eab3480f2233509ef5483d73c41a83ab5af79ef019c8fe350%}
Order date: {% GetSiteDateTime(Order.OrderDate) |(user)administrator|(hash)c57b65e664a35833da36581405f3005737a8299dd2bb3ab3581c79d781144bf2%}
Supplier
 
Company address
Customer

{%BillingAddress.ApplyTransformation("Ecommerce.Transformations.Order_Address") |(user)administrator|(hash)9e5056afdf5f5f09df7afb09910a29bba0a021b78146c08716d7d9947b7db6e5%}

If you want to cancel your request or you did not submit the request please go to the following link {%CancelUrl%} to invalidate the resetting link.

CMS_EmailTemplate.EmailTemplateText:
Your password has been changed.

Your user name and new password are:

User name: {%TrimSitePrefix(UserName)%}
Password: {%Password%}

The following memberships will expire soon:
{%MembershipsTable.ApplyTransformation("Ecommerce.Transformations.Order_MembershipsTable")|(user)administrator|(hash)169c96d174326312b6d527ee40cd21caab00649b9fb97ef7636390bf5044c179%}
To renew it, please follow these steps:
  1. In My profile section on My memberships tab, click Buy membership. You will be redirected to the Buy membership page.
  2. Choose the required membership and add it to your shopping cart.
  3. Finish your order.
  4. Once you pay the order, your membership will be renewed.
This is an automatic reminder, please do not respond.
Thank you.

Password: {%Password%}

E-mail: {%email%}
